@southpaw63 wrote:

try deleting one of the publicvoid pkrules. save it, but don’t close it, then compile, if its fixed, close it, if not, ctrl+z it.

item.title: Need help really badly!
item.dc:creator: @humza-ali humza-ali
item.description:
@humza-ali wrote:

hi im trying to make a scroll (dont know publicvoid?) when i do it it keeps saying a error… this is what i done i want to say ::commands and then a list of commands will show up this is what i’ve done.

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public void customInterface(){ //grey patterned interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@cya@Play Server", 3024); sendQuest("@bla@Welcome to humzascape!", 3026); sendQuest("@whi@Owner and Coder is humza.", 3027); sendQuest("@whi@I would like to thankhumza for his source.", 3028); sendQuest("@blu@Type ::info for information about the server.", 3029); sendQuest("@blu@For runes, type ::runes.", 3030); sendQuest("@blu@For barrage runes, type ::brunes.", 3031); sendQuest("@cya@Recent Updates", 3032); sendQuest("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~", 3033); sendQuest("Put your recent updates here.", 3035); showInterface(3023); flushOutStream(); } public void commands(){ //grey patterned interface sendQuest("commands", 8144); // Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@bla@humzascape Rules", 8145); sendQuest("--------------------", 8147); sendQuest("1) Don't pretend to be humza - MUTE", 8148); sendQuest("2) Absolutely NO Swearing! - MUTE", 8149); sendQuest("3) You Can Only Team in ::clwars! - BAN", 8150); sendQuest("4) No Spamming! - MUTE", 8152); sendQuest("5) Be Respectful to Other Players and Staff! - MUTE", 8153); sendQuest("Remember, always follow server rules.", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } public void PKRules(){ //grey patterned interface sendQuest("@bla@PK Rules", 8144); // Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@bla@humzascape PK Rules", 8146); //Sub Title sendQuest("--------------------", 8147); sendQuest("1) Looting IS allowed!", 8149); sendQuest("2) Teaming is only allowed in C-Wars.", 8150); sendQuest("3) Farcasting IS allowed!", 8151); sendQuest("4) Don't use bannable spells.", 8152); sendQuest("5) Don't use Ice Rush please.", 8153); sendQuest("Remember, always follow server rules.", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } public void Rules(){ //grey patterned interface sendQuest("Rules", 8144); // Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@bla@humzascape Rules", 8145); sendQuest("--------------------", 8147); sendQuest("1) Don't pretend to be humza - MUTE", 8148); sendQuest("2) Absolutely NO Swearing! - MUTE", 8149); sendQuest("3) You Can Only Team in ::clwars! - BAN", 8150); sendQuest("4) No Spamming! - MUTE", 8152); sendQuest("5) Be Respectful to Other Players and Staff! - MUTE", 8153); sendQuest("Remember, always follow server rules.", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } public void PKRules(){ //grey patterned interface sendQuest("@bla@PK Rules", 8144); // Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@bla@humzascape PK Rules", 8146); //Sub Title sendQuest("--------------------", 8147); sendQuest("1) Looting IS allowed!", 8149); sendQuest("2) Teaming is only allowed in C-Wars.", 8150); sendQuest("3) Farcasting IS allowed!", 8151); sendQuest("4) Don't use bannable spells.", 8152); sendQuest("5) Don't use Ice Rush please.", 8153); sendQuest("Remember, always follow server rules.", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

btw i just copied and pasted the rules thing so im gonna edit the commands one lol
